湱字的基本解释

湱
huò
波涛冲击声：湍流湱湱。渹湱（浪涛冲击声）澎湃。

湱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huò］
［《廣韻》虎伯切，入陌，曉。］
水波相击声。

湱字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第18
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?霍虢切，音砉。漰湱，波相激聲。【郭璞·江賦】漰湱澩灂。　又【唐韻】呼麥切，音剨。漍湱水，出西谿。

湱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
湱字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
huò
The impact of waves: turbulent flow. Lu Yan (the sound of waves crashing) surging.
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huò]
["Guangyun" Hu Bo cuts, enters the street, and dawns. ]
The sound of water waves colliding.
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 18
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Huo Guo cut, the sound.漰湱, the waves are exciting. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Ranyan River.　[Tang Yun] Call Maiqie, sound plucking. Chuanyanshui, out of Xixi.
